description.text: Fits a power spectrum for the knee frequency by finding the 1/f^a power law and the white noise limit. The data must be ordered.

float.name: Max. 1/f^a Freq.
float.descr: The value of a maximum frequency dominated by 1/f noise.

float.name: Min. White Noise Freq.
float.descr: The value of a minimum frquency dominated by white noise.

float.name: White Noise C
float.descr: The knee frequency is calculated as the frequency at which the 1/f^a noise power is equal to C * (white noise power)

table.name: Y Fitted
table.descr: The array of fitted Y values.

table.name: Residuals
table.descr: The residuals of the fitted data.

table.name: Parameters
table.descr: The parameter values of the fit.

table.name: Covariance
table.descr: The covariance matrix of the fit.
